abstract.t: This document gives a construction for a Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM)-based authentication mechanism in TLS 1.3. This proposal authenticates peers via a key exchange protocol, using their long- term (KEM) public keys. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Discussion of this document takes place on the mailing list (), which is archived at. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/claucece/draft-celi-wiggers-tls-authkem.
